pkgmetadata.longdescription: Merged Block Randomization // Package to carry out merged block randomization (Van der Pas (2019), doi:10.1177/1740774519827957), a restricted randomization method designed for small clinical trials (at most 100 subjects) or trials with small strata, for example in multicentre trials. It can be used for more than two groups or unequal randomization ratios.
